Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.Model.Player

Class Machine

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.Model.Player.Machine
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayer
public class Machine extends Object implements IPlayer
Simple machine (CPU) player implementation. It mirrors the Human implementation and stores its own shots and state.
